description:
The two Dragon Slayers clash fist-to-fist! Natsu challenges Gajeel with fists full of anger, furious at what he`s done to Lucy. A battle between two Dragon Slayers is as fierce as one between two dragons themselves! But Natsu, exhausted from his serious of battles with the Element 4, begins to be pressured by Gajeel, and the fight slowly goes in Phantom Lord`s direction... Under this intense battle, what will become of Fairy Tail?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 二人の滅竜魔導士[ドラゴンスレイヤー]
